title: Strengthening System Design Competencies in Practice: Math-Based Community Problem Solving Through Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical concepts (statistics, data analysis) and general interest in community activities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more problem-solving solutions using mathematical modeling techniques during community needs analysis.

Learners preprocess service project data (e.g., user logs, survey responses) using Python’s Pandas library and derive ≥3 insights (e.g., user behavior patterns, service improvement points) via visualization tools (Matplotlib/Seaborn).
Enhance civic engagement competencies (self-efficacy, social responsibility) by over 20% through service activities applying mathematical knowledge
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
